subsection.name: 0.1 release
subsection.p: Releasing the changes accumulated over past 10 months of development. Acknowledging the fact that we have not progressed towards 0.2 release goals yet we tag the release 0.1.1. Over the past months Coral was substantialy improved in the areas of memory footprint, startup time, and runtime performance. With this release we bumped Status rating on the home page from "Alpha" to "Stable" bypassing the intermediate steps because Coral is already being used in mission-critical applications for many months now.
